title: Azure Security Fundamentals
subtitle: Foundation in Azure Security
description: Master the fundamental security concepts and services in Microsoft Azure
overview: This comprehensive 2-day course covers the essential security concepts and services in Microsoft Azure. Learn to implement identity management, network security, data protection, and monitoring solutions to secure your Azure environment.

learningObjectives.title: Understand Azure security architecture
learningObjectives.description: Learn Azure security principles, frameworks, and architectural concepts

learningObjectives.title: Implement identity and access management
learningObjectives.description: Configure Azure AD, MFA, conditional access, and RBAC

learningObjectives.title: Configure network security controls
learningObjectives.description: Implement network security groups, firewalls, and secure connectivity

learningObjectives.title: Apply data protection mechanisms
learningObjectives.description: Implement encryption, key management, and data security controls

learningObjectives.title: Monitor and audit security events
learningObjectives.description: Configure Azure Security Center and monitoring solutions

learningObjectives.title: Respond to security incidents effectively
learningObjectives.description: Learn incident response procedures and Azure Sentinel basics

personalStory.story: As someone who has guided hundreds of professionals into Azure, I've seen firsthand how the right foundation makes all the difference. I remember working with a team of traditional infrastructure engineers who were skeptical about cloud. After this training, they successfully migrated their first workloads to Azure and became cloud advocates. This course distills everything I wish I knew when I started with Azure.
